channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- EmbedStories
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- EmbedStories

item.title: CVE-2023-0372|2023-02-21T08:50:49.266Z -- unknown -- embedstories
item.description: The EmbedStories WordPress plugin before 0.7.5 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks
